articles.title: The United Kingdom police have nabbed two teens associated with the Bitcoin extortion group Scattered Spider
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: One of the two teens associated with the Bitcoin extortion gang Scattered Spider has been arrested in the UK. According to reports, the gang extorted more than $115 million in ransom payments from more than 100 organizations, including the UK government and the media. The other suspect is still at large.
